Posts.Content: kfprev wrote: has anyone experienced muscle spasms as a side effect of tac? i have been having spasms of my torso, hips and feet and didn't know if it was related to the treatment. anyone else have this problem? i do have fibromyalgia and it could be from that. kfprev Log in to post a reply
